name: Muhammad Basheer

top_projects.name: VyuhBot
top_projects.description: Vyuhbot is a low cost quadbot with a  esp 32 microcontroller.

top_projects.name: Esp32-Google_assistant
top_projects.description: Integrating Esp32 Development Board with Google assistant.

basheerbk/VyuhBot.summary: The VyuhBot repository has experienced significant activity, with multiple push events occurring between October 2024 and November 2024. These events included updates to the README.md file, the creation of new files such as Img1.png and vbot.cpp, and the deletion of existing files like Dxf/test.txt. The repository has seen a notable amount of growth and modification during this period, indicating ongoing development and refinement of the project.

sebinmpn/Night_Class.summary: The Night_Class repository has seen a series of push events between October 2024, primarily involving the addition of new folders and the creation of a README.md file. One of the push events also included a merge from the main branch, suggesting collaborative work on the project. Overall, the repository has demonstrated a pattern of active development and organization during this time.

profile_summary:
Muhammad Basheer is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong foundation in C++ and HTML, leveraging his expertise to drive innovative solutions. As a coder and solder, he brings a unique combination of technical skills and hands-on experience to the table, making him a valuable asset in the development community. With a growing network of 11 followers, Muhammad has established himself as a respected figure in the industry, known for his reliability and technical prowess. His active participation in development is evident through his 19 public repositories, showcasing his commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.

As a dedicated and results-driven professional, Muhammad is passionate about harnessing the power of technology to drive positive change. With a keen eye for detail and a talent for creative problem-solving, he consistently delivers exceptional results that exceed expectations. By staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices, Muhammad remains at the forefront of the development landscape, providing cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of his clients. With his strong technical skills, innovative approach, and collaborative mindset, Muhammad is an ideal partner for businesses and organizations seeking to leverage technology to achieve their goals and stay ahead of the curve.
